column2:
"The current situation?
It's a long story so I'll just summarize it for you."

"First,changes in organization.
Void, the organization that did
inhumane studies started 40 years ago."

"Luther was the leader.
He took the knowledge and power
from Xion and controlled both
Oracle and ARKS behind the scenes."
"Luther said it was to understand Xion, but he just wanted her power."

"However, half a year ago
With <%me>'s cooperation,
we managed to wrest control from Luther."

"We discovered that Luther was
Dark Falz【Loser】. ARKS managed
to defeat him."

"Oracle was released from the
Photonners... No, from Luther's
control."

"After the death of Xion.
I, as her copy, took over her
in managing the fleet."

"Up to this point, there were
several issues. But I guess we
are in a good spot for now."
"I guess Xion worked hard for this..."

"Matoi... She's been through
difficult times."

"Previously, we travelled 10 years
back to know more about Matoi's
past and the reason behind her
deleted records. Everything was
revealed then."

"Matoi... 2nd generation Claris Claes
in a battle against Darkers
10 years ago,nearly turned into
【Profound Darkness】due to Darker's influence."

"Without hesitation, she tried to
kill herself in order to prevent
the Darker's influence within
her from growing."

"Back then,<%me> was investigating
her past. She was then caught
in your time travel back to the
present."

"She lost both her memories and
power. You met her 10 years after
that incident."

"It wouldn't have mattered if she
lost her powers permanently.
However, not only has she
regained her powers, she managed
to reunite with Clarissa."

"I am registering her as an
ARKS member.However, that
corruption from 10 years ago...
I can't guarantee that it would
not happen again."

"Right now, I do not have any
data regarding that incident.
However, I just want you to know
about the possibility."
"And if the need arises..."

"...Forget it.
It would be better to not think
about it."

"In any case, I would like you
to stay close with Matoi.
I am sure that that is her wish
too"

"Dark Falz【Persona】.
Truth be told, he remains a mystery to us."

"He does not control specific
Darker types.
However, he constantly interferes
with <%me> and Matoi."

"As we have seen, 10 years ago,
【Persona】appeared in front 2nd Generation Claris Claes;Matoi.
Just to deceive her."

"From appearance to perimeters,
every detail was an exact match
with you. He too, was able to
travel across time."
"How was【Persona】capable of such feat is a mystery."

"It would be best to assume that
【Persona】is equally unique as you,
possessing exceptional qualities."

"However, I do have a hypothesis
but that requires further
investigations. I'll contact you
if there are further findings."

"Analysation of the data collected
from Wopal's Facility is
progressing smoothly. The data
has allowed us to know more
about Wopal."

"Originally, Planet Wopal was a
designed as a resort for
Photoners."

"The ruins of an amusement park
and shiny structures can be
found."

"However, something regarding
【Profound Darkness】caused the
resort to be abandoned."

"As the Photonners travelled
through the universe, Luther
noticed the facility."

"Not only was the facility
remodelled to do experiments,
it seems as if the planet was
remodelled as well."

"I guess this was what he was
planning all along when he met
Xion"

"Although the experiments were
not very successful in the
records..."

"Luther got bored of the
experiments, leaving its
facilities behind along with
Wopal. The Wopal natives then
underwent its own evolution."

"The abandoning of experimental
victims resulted in current
Wopal, a mixed up ecosystem."
"He is a real pain huh?"

"Sara and Claris Claes.
Well, there's no reason to lie
to you. I'll tell you everything I know"

"Sara was abducted by Luther
10 years ago due to her brief
connection with Clarissa."

"Sara was used in multiple
experiments again and again,
obtaining data after data.
The very same data that was
later thrown out as garbage."

"As I observed the Oracle,
I noticed this. I decided to not
act impulsively if I wished to
save her"
"I contacted Maria to rescue Sara, to bring her to me."

"Come to think about it, that was
the first time I contacted Maria."

"It was surprising that she
believed a message that came
from an unknown sender."

"But I digress. Let's get back
to the topic."

"Luther's experiments released
the Photons within Sara's body,
thus disabling her ability to
ever use Techniques again."

"In short. The photons in her
body now is supplied by me."
"Thus, Sara is connected to me."

"Moving on, Claris Claes is a
clone of Sara, using Sara's data."

"She was created to use an
imitation of Clarissa, which
pushed the limits of Techniques."

"Her body age was set to be the
same as Sara, with certain
growth forced upon it. Her actual
age is actually 5-6 years old."

"Well. Nothing can be done at
this point."

"Both of them decided to live
their lives seperately as Sara
and Claris Claes."

"I'll watch over them. Whatever
happened was in the past.
The two of them have moved on,
towards a better future."

"About the corrupted area that
appeared in Naberius?"

"In any case, it is an abnormal
corruption. However, this
appearance is discomforting."

"Instead of saying that the place
is corrupted, it is leaning more
towards a parallel universe."
"The reactions I am getting feels like an aberration from its natives"

"The cause or origins of this is
unknown. There is no information
left behind by Xion as well."

"Therefore, even if it is
dangerous, we have to
investigate."

"Besides, there is a possibility
that this may occur to other
places. I cannot simply sit back
and watch it happen."

"I've seen the records of you
meeting【Persona】and analyzed
it accordingly."

"He gave you a piece of advice,
but at the same time, it is
too vague."

"Personally, I feel that we
should not ignore his words."
"Sukuna-hime,the Ash Miko in Harkotan's legend."

"Although her title is a Miko,
she feels more like a god,
the god of Harkotan."

"She doesn't seem keen to be
treated as a god, perhaps she
wants to be a treated as a normal
person. I can understand how
she feels..."

"I do not wish to return to the
state where my consciousness was
in that pool of water. I want
to be like everyone else here."

"Enough with the small talk...
Sukuna-hime is the god of good,
while Magatsu is a god of evil
and annihilation, the god that
harms the planet."

"Be it Shironians or Kuronites,
it's destruction knows no bounds."

"Sukuna-hime has sealed Magatsu
a long time ago but it seems
that the power of the seals are
fading."

"While reapplying the seal,
【Double】's interference caused
a part of Magatsu to escape."

"I am more concerned about how
【Double】is going to use Magatsus
power than simply the fact that
a part of Magatsu escaped."

"This isn't simply a problem for
Harkotan, but the universe as
well."

"In other words, Magatsu is a
threat to the universe that
ARKS protects."

"１０年前の真相……
ぼくたちが見てきたあの裏で
別の事件も起きていたんだね。"

"まあ、当然と言えば当然か。
世界はぼくたちの視点だけで
動いているわけじゃないしね。"

"さて、１０年前の出来事を整理すると
まず、『彼女』と【若人】が交戦し
【若人】の撃退に成功。"

"しかし、【若人】は死んでおらず
次の依り代としてアフィンの姉
ユクリータを乗っ取ろうとした。"

"でも、その場に【双子】が現れ
乗っ取ろうとしていた【若人】を
食べてしまった、というわけだ。"

"【双子】はユクリータを連れ去り
さらに、アークスシップで暴れ回った後
撤退していった、という流れさ。"

"ユクリータ自身は、【双子】に
操られていたようなもので
完全なダークファルスとは言いがたい。"

"あれだけ元の意識が残ってたことを
鑑みるに、彼女はアークスとしての
才能がかなりあったのかもしれない。"

"けど、彼女が【若人】になっていたのと
【双子】の影響下にあったのは、事実。
……正直、とても中途半端な存在だ。"

"だから、今後も注視は必要。
そういう意味では、アフィンの申し出は
ぼくにとっても渡りに船さ。"

"指示せずとも、彼が自主的に
ユクリータの監視をしてくれるからね。"

"<%me>と
マトイが取り込まれた【双子】の内。"

"持ち帰ることのできたデータから
推測するに、あれはひとつの世界。
ひとつの宇宙をなしている。"

"今、ぼくたちがいる宇宙とは
別の次元にある、もう一つの宇宙。
……並行宇宙とでも呼べばいいのかな。"

"もっとも、宇宙全体の大きさ
規模としては比べるまでもなく
【双子】の内の方が小さいけどね。"

"……かつて、フォトナーの研究の中にも
別次元や、亜空間と呼ばれるような
並行宇宙に関するものがあった。"

"その技術、その知識を利用していると
考えればあり得ない話じゃないけど……
無茶苦茶な話である事に変わりはない。"

"【双子】はその宇宙を自分たちの物置の
ように使って、模倣体のオリジナルを
格納し、適時引っ張り出してきている。"

"もし、あのまま君やマトイが
向こうに残されていたら、君たちの
模倣体が作り出されていたのかも……"

"それこそ、ぞっとしない話だ。
戻ってきてくれて、本当によかったよ。"

"……代償は大きかったかもしれないけど
まずは無事を喜ばないと、だね。"

"……マトイは、君から
ダーカーの因子を全て引き受けて
そして、姿を消した。"

"最後の時にはサラが立ち会い
ぼくもその記録を見てみたが……
あれは、もう、どうしようもない。"

"圧倒的なまでのダーカー因子。
ダークファルスすらも超えた存在……
【深遠なる闇】に、なろうとしていた。"

"マトイの行方については、アークスを
総動員して調査を続けている。"

"……それに際して、全アークスに
マトイの基礎情報を全て開示したよ。"

"マトイも、君も
ダーカーを喰らう力を持つ
特別な存在。"

"そして、その能力の
リスクについても……
……１０年前にあったことについても。"

"【深遠なる闇】に至ろうとしてることも
包み隠さずに、全てを公開した。"

"……最初からそうするべきだったんだ。
ぼくは、最初から君たちを
無理矢理にでも止めるべきだった。"

"今回のことは、人に思考を寄せすぎて
それをしなかった、ぼくの手落ち。
……だから、もう間違えない。"
"……マトイの行方は、アークスが捜す。"

"君は検査の後、休んでいて欲しい。
決して、一人でなんとかしようなんて
考えないこと。"

"アークスの管理者としての命令だ。
……いいね、絶対に守ってよ。"

"アークスの全戦力は君とマトイのために
動くことを約束するよ。"

"これは、ぼくが命令したわけじゃない。
君のために力を尽くしたいと
みんなから申し出があったんだ。"

"……君が為してきたことに
無駄なことなんて何もなかったんだ。
今このときのために、今までがあった。"

"みんなの意志を一つにして
ただ一人を救うために力を尽くす。
……それが、今のアークスの姿なんだ。"

"ううん……違うか。
きっとこれが、人の姿なんだね。
……シオンにも見せてあげたかったな。"

"ぼくの演算の及ばない場所に
君とマトイは至ってしまったよ。"

"この結末は、予想できなかった。
全部が全部、ぼくの想定外さ。"

"でもね、きっとシオンにだって
この結末は演算できてなかったと
ぼくは思うよ。"

"ありえなかった未来を作り出す……
……それがきっと、シオンから君に
託された力の本質なんだろうね。"

"問題が全て解決されたわけじゃない。
ぼくたちにはまだやることが
たくさん残されている。"

"……けど今は、この新たな未来を
素直に喜んでいたいな。ははっ。"

"【深遠なる闇】は、依代となった
【仮面】によって、ナベリウスに
復活直前の状態で留められているんだ。"

"【深遠なる闇】が復活しようとし
君やアークスが戦い、力を削いだら
【仮面】の力によって復活前に戻る。"

"このサイクルを繰り返してるおかげで
復活は免れてはいるんだけど……
いつまで保たれるかはわからない。"

"だから今のうちに、この問題について
ぼくは徹底的に演算を行おうと思う。"

"答えが見つかる保証はないけれど
全てを救う方法を、探したいんだ。"

"ユクリータは【若人】ではなかった。
あくまで、その残滓を受けとったのみ。"

"しかし、そんなユクリータの内から
アウロラと名乗る女性が現れた。
彼女は自身を原初の【若人】と言う。"

"……なんとも、【若人】に関しては
イレギュラーなことが多すぎて
判断に困るよね。"

"でも、アウロラの言はあながち嘘でも
なさそうなんだ。"

"彼女の出現にあわせて、リリーパでの
ダーカーの活動が活発化している。"

"……いや、ダーカーの活動が活発になり
結果、ユクリータの中に残っていた
アウロラが目覚めた、というべきか。"

"リリーパにおけるダーカーの活発化は
おそらく【深遠なる闇】の影響だけど
……それだけではなさそうだ。"

"君自身のことはもちろん
アフィンやユクリータたちのことも
よろしく頼むよ。"
"この場を離れる"
"Oracle Fleet's Situation"
"Matoi's Situation"
"Mystery behind【Persona】"
"Wopal's Facility"
"Sara and Claris Claes"
"Corrupted Area"
"Sukuna-hime and Magatsu"
"The truth 10 years ago"
"双子の内的宇宙"
"マトイの行方"
"【Profound Darkness】Situation"
"【Apprentice】について"
"【深遠なる闇】について"
